summary.para: Rebinds a constant buffer from a source slot to a destination slot.

param.name: uSrcSlot
param.para: Type: UINT
The source slot number for rebinding.

param.name: uDstSlot
param.para: Type: UINT
The destination slot number for rebinding.

param.name: cbDstOffset
param.para: Type: UINT
The offset in bytes of the destination slot for rebinding. The offset must have 16-byte alignment.

item.description: S_OK for a valid rebinding
S_FALSE for rebinding a nonexistent slot; that is, for which the shader reflection doesn’t have any data
E_FAIL for an invalid rebinding, for example, the rebinding is out-of-bounds
Possibly one of the other Direct3D 11 Return Codes

summary.para: Rebinds a constant buffer by name to a destination slot.

param.name: pName
param.para: Type: LPCSTR
The name of the constant buffer for rebinding.

param.name: uDstSlot
param.para: Type: UINT
The destination slot number for rebinding.

param.name: cbDstOffset
param.para: Type: UINT
The offset in bytes of the destination slot for rebinding. The offset must have 16-byte alignment.

item.description: S_OK for a valid rebinding
S_FALSE for rebinding a nonexistent slot; that is, for which the shader reflection doesn’t have any data
E_FAIL for an invalid rebinding, for example, the rebinding is out-of-bounds
Possibly one of the other Direct3D 11 Return Codes

summary.para: Rebinds a texture or buffer from source slot to destination slot.

param.name: uSrcSlot
param.para: Type: UINT
The first source slot number for rebinding.

param.name: uDstSlot
param.para: Type: UINT
The first destination slot number for rebinding.

param.name: uCount
param.para: Type: UINT
The number of slots for rebinding.

item.description: S_OK for a valid rebinding
S_FALSE for rebinding a nonexistent slot; that is, for which the shader reflection doesn’t have any data
E_FAIL for an invalid rebinding, for example, the rebinding is out-of-bounds
Possibly one of the other Direct3D 11 Return Codes

summary.para: Rebinds a resource as an unordered access view (UAV) from source slot to destination slot.

param.name: uSrcSrvSlot
param.para: Type: UINT
The first source slot number for rebinding.

param.name: uDstUavSlot
param.para: Type: UINT
The first destination slot number for rebinding.

param.name: uCount
param.para: Type: UINT
The number of slots for rebinding.

item.description: S_OK for a valid rebinding
S_FALSE for rebinding a nonexistent slot; that is, for which the shader reflection doesn’t have any data
E_FAIL for an invalid rebinding, for example, the rebinding is out-of-bounds
Possibly one of the other Direct3D 11 Return Codes

summary.para: Rebinds a resource by name as an unordered access view (UAV) to destination slots.

param.name: pSrvName
param.para: Type: LPCSTR
The name of the resource for rebinding.

param.name: uDstUavSlot
param.para: Type: UINT
The first destination slot number for rebinding.

param.name: uCount
param.para: Type: UINT
The number of slots for rebinding.

item.description: S_OK for a valid rebinding
S_FALSE for rebinding a nonexistent slot; that is, for which the shader reflection doesn’t have any data
E_FAIL for an invalid rebinding, for example, the rebinding is out-of-bounds
Possibly one of the other Direct3D 11 Return Codes

param.para: Type: LPCSTR

param.name: uDstSlot
param.para: Type: UINT
The first destination slot number for rebinding.

param.name: uCount
param.para: Type: UINT
The number of slots for rebinding.

item.description: S_OK for a valid rebinding
S_FALSE for rebinding a nonexistent slot; that is, for which the shader reflection doesn’t have any data
E_FAIL for an invalid rebinding, for example, the rebinding is out-of-bounds
Possibly one of the other Direct3D 11 Return Codes

summary.para: A module-instance interface is used for resource rebinding. Note This interface is part of the HLSL shader linking technology that you can use on all Direct3D 11 platforms to create precompiled HLSL functions, package them into libraries, and link them into full shaders at run time.

remarks.para: To get a module-instance interface, call or .
Note ID3D11ModuleInstance requires the D3dcompiler_47.dll or a later version of the DLL.
